summary.span: 表示可用于呈现一组项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种可以包含多个项的 类型，如字符串、对象或其他元素。An is a type of that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements. 下图显示了一个 控件，该控件包含以下不同类型的项：The following illustration shows a control that contains the following different types of items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个 对象。A object. - 包含 和 的 控件。A control that contains an and a . ![具有四种类型内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 包含多种类型对象的 ListBoxListBox that contains multiple types of objects 使用 "" 或 "" 属性来指定要用于生成 内容的集合。Use either the or the property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your . 可以将 属性设置为任何实现 的类型。You can set the property to any type that implements . 通常用于显示数据集合或将 绑定到集合对象。 is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an to a collection object. 如果你不希望使用实现 来填充 的对象，则可以使用 属性来添加项。If you do not want to use an object that implements to populate the , you can add items by using the property. 中的项可以具有不同的类型。The items in an can have different types. 例如，一个 可以包含一个作为字符串的项，另一个是 的项。For example, a can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an . 设置 属性时， 集合设置为只读且固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is set to read-only and fixed-size. 这意味着不能直接向集合中添加项。This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly. 如果正在使用 ，则将属性设置为 `null` 将删除该集合，并将使用情况还原到 ，这将是一个空 。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 每个 类型都有相应的项容器类型。Each type has a corresponding item container type. 每个 对应的项容器将 `Item` 追加到其名称。The corresponding item container for each appends `Item` to its name. 例如，对于 ，项容器是 控件;对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the item containers are controls; for , they are controls. 可以为 中的每个项显式创建容器类型，但这并不是必需的。You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the , but it is not necessary. 如果未显式创建容器类型，则会生成一个包含项集合中的数据项的。When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection. 例如，如果将字符串对象的集合绑定到 的 属性，则不会显式创建 对象，但 将为每个字符串生成一个对象。For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the property of a , you do not explicitly create objects, but the will generate one for each string. 您可以使用 属性访问生成的项容器。You can access a generated item container by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 当 包含重复对象时，UI 自动化的某些功能无法正常工作。Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an contains duplicate objects. 如果对象多次出现，则只有第一个实例出现在自动化树中。If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree. （如果 `Object.Equals(x, y)` 返回 `true`，则两个对象**x**和**y**被视为重复。）(Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > 当使用对象**x**时， 由 x 返回的值 **。**`GetHashCode()`While an object **x** is in use by an the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()` 不得更改。must not change. 对此值所做的更改不受支持，导致不可预知的行为。Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior. 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据绑定到 。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名为 `MyData` 的类，该类是一个简单的字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 下面的示例将 的 对象绑定到 `MyData`。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示了在上一个示例中创建的 控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性填充 。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将以下不同类型的项添加到 ：The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个包含其他 对象的 控件。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示了在上一个示例中创建的 。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![具有四种类型内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "具有四种类型内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 下面的示例演示如何使用 提供的不同样式和与模板相关的属性。The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the . 本示例中的 绑定到 `Task` 对象的集合。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered. ![System.windows.controls.itemscontrol> 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 此处未显示的 的两个其他样式相关属性 和 。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可以指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，您可以为 中的每个第三项指定交替的背景色。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 分配给 中的每个项容器。The is assigned to each item container in the . 从0开始，递增，直到 减1，然后重新从0开始。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果 为3，并且 中有七项，则下表列出每个项的 。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |项在 中的位置Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 您可以使用几种方法为交替项容器指定不同的外观。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一种方法是将 items 容器的属性绑定到 。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然后，可以使用 指定应将哪个值应用到具有特定 值的项容器。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 你还可以使用触发器来更改项容器的属性的值，具体取决于其 的值。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例指定从 继承的 包含交替项容器（类型为 ），并为每个容器指定不同的背景和前景。The following example specifies that the (which inherits from ) has alternating item containers (which are of type ) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one. 该示例将 和 属性绑定到 ，并为每个属性提供一个 。The example binds the and properties to the and provides an for each property. [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] 下面的示例通过使用 对象执行与前面的示例相同的示例。The following example does the same as the previous example by using objects. span.span: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是定义描述如何显示数据对象的默认模板的一种简单方法。This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在下面的示例中，名为 `places` 的静态资源定义为 `Place` 对象的集合，其中每个 `Place` 对象都有一个 `CityName` 属性和一个 `State` 属性。In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property. 前缀 `src` 映射到定义数据源 `Places` 的命名空间。The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined. 前缀 `scm` 和 `dat` 分别映射到 和 命名空间。The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the and namespaces, respectively. 下面的示例创建数据集合的视图，数据按城市名称排序，并按州分组。The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state. [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 视图可以是绑定源，如以下示例中所示。The view can be a binding source, as in the following example. 由于指定的 ，将显示每个`Place` 对象及其 `CityName` 值。Because of the specified , each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value. 如果未指定 且没有 ，则 将显示基础集合中每个对象的字符串表示形式（在本例中为 "SDKSample"）。If is not specified and there is no , then the displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place"). [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在搜索项时是否使用大小写作为条件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether case is a condition when searching for items.

value.span: 如果文本搜索区分大小写，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if text searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 属性指定是否在 中选择某一项。When the property is set to `true`, the property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an . 例如，如果 包含两个仅大小写不同的字符串（如 "ITEM" 和 "item"），则将始终选择第一个字符串，而不考虑输入的大小写。For example, if an contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含字符串 "DOG"、"CAT"、"dog" 和 "cat" 的 。The following example creates a that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat". 该示例将 属性绑定到 的 属性。The example binds the property to the property of a . 如果选中此复选框，并且用户键入 "dog"，则将选择 中的第三项。If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the is selected. 如果用户取消选中此复选框并键入 "dog"，则将选择第一项，因为大小写不是搜索条件。If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，每个项容器均获取与 具有相同 对象的 ，但描述绑定中的数据的属性（如 和 ）特定于 中每个项的数据。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 您必须访问项容器的 以执行操作，例如验证数据和检查项是否有错误。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分，该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户，并为每个客户分配一个销售代表，然后检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer, and then checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例设置了 的 ，因此 `AreasMatch`将验证每个项。The example sets the of the so the , `AreasMatch`, will validate each item. 该示例还创建了一个显示验证错误的 。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. 请注意， 的 绑定到从 属性获取的 。Notice that the of the is bound to a that it gets from the property. 的值是包含错误的项容器。The value of is the item container that has the error. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#itembindinggroup)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSiteFor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#validationadornersitefor)] 下面的示例获取项容器，并调用容器的 来验证数据。The following example gets the item container and calls on the container's to validate the data. 必须通过对项容器的 调用方法，而不是在 的 上调用方法来验证数据。You must validate the data by calling a method on the item container's , not on the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 负责为其主机（例如 ）生成 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。An is responsible for generating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for its host, such as an . 它保留控件数据视图中项与相应 对象之间的关联。It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding objects. 每个 都有一个关联的项容器，其中包含项集合中的数据项。Every has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection. 可以使用 属性访问与 关联的项容器。You can use the property to access the item container that is associated with your . 例如，如果您有一个数据绑定 控件，并且您希望基于其索引或其关联数据项获取 ，则可以使用 或 方法。For example, if you have a data-bound control and you want to get a based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the or the method. 或者，可以使用 或 方法来获取与给定生成的容器元素关联的索引或数据项。Alternatively, you can use the or the method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element. 在高级方案中也使用 接口。The interface is also used in advanced scenarios. 通常，具有其自己的虚拟化面板实现的高级应用程序会调用接口的成员。Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。You use this property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件;对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 若要影响项的布局，请使用 属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果对控件使用分组，则可以使用 "" 或 "" 属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 若要指定数据对象的可视化，请使用 或 属性。To specify the visualization of data objects, use the or property. 有关何时指定 的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about when to specify an , see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则，通常建议对样式 `StaticResource` 引用以提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* `x:Key` 字符串值，该值引用作为资源请求的样式。`x:Key` string value referring to the style being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example demonstrates how to use this property. 请考虑以下数据绑定 ：Consider the following data-bound : [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#UIListBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#uilistbox)] 若要为包含数据项的元素创建样式，请创建 样式，如以下示例中所示。To create a style for the elements that contain the data items, create a style, as shown in the following example. 样式应用于在其中定义样式的范围内的所有 元素。The style is applied to all elements within the scope the style is defined in. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxItemStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxitemstyle)] 是 控件的容器元素。The is the container element for the control. 因此，上述一种替代方法是将 的 属性设置为定义的样式。Therefore, an alternative to the preceding is to set the property of the to the defined style. 为此，请为 样式提供 `x:Key`，使其可用作资源：To do that, give the style an `x:Key` so it is available as a resource: [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ContainerStyle1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#containerstyle1)] 接下来，将 属性设置为资源，如以下示例中所示：Next, set the property to the resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ListBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#listbox)] 上述两个方案都生成相同的结果。Both of the preceding scenarios produce the same result. 不过，使样式作为资源提供的优点之一是可以重复使用样式。However, one of the advantages of making the style available as a resource is that you can reuse the style. 显式设置 属性还能提供更好的可读性。Setting the property explicitly can also provide greater readability. 有关完整示例，请参阅[样式设置和模板化示例简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010)。For the complete example, see [Introduction to Styling and Templating Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160010). 下面的示例旨在说明 提供的不同样式和模板相关属性的功能。The following example is designed to illustrate the function of the different styling and templating related properties provided by the . 本示例中的 绑定到 `Task` 对象的集合。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 下面是该示例在呈现时的屏幕快照：The following is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered: ![System.windows.controls.itemscontrol> 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 此处未显示的 的两个其他样式相关属性 和 。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection. 在 上设置 时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 按如下方式生成（使用 作为示例）：When you set an on an , the to create a container for each data item. 对于 ，容器为 。For , the container is a . 生成器将回调到 来准备容器。The generator calls back into the to prepare the container. 2. 部分准备工作涉及将 复制到 的 。Part of the preparation involves the copying of the of the to be the of the . 3. 与所有 类型类似， 的 包含 。Similar to all types, the of a contains a . 应用模板时，它将创建一个 ，其 绑定到 的 。When the template is applied, it creates a whose is bound to the of the . 4. 最后， 将该 应用于自身，这将创建 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Finally, the applies that to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果定义了多个 并且想要提供逻辑来以编程方式选择和应用 ，请使用 属性。If you have more than one defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a , use the property. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用 属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。Use the 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。One of the following: [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md), or [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md). 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则，通常建议使用样式的[StaticResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)引用来提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 用于引用作为资源请求的模板的[X：Key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)字符串值。[x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) string value referring to the template being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 内联。The following example shows how to create a inline. 指定每个数据项在 内显示为三个 元素。The specifies that each data item appears as three elements within a . 在此示例中，数据对象是一个名为 `Task`的类。In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`. 请注意，此模板中的每个 元素都绑定到 `Task` 类的属性。Note that each element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#Inline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#inline)] 在 resources 节中定义一个 更常见，因此它可以是一个可重用对象，如下例所示：It is more common to define a in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#AsResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#asresource)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 现在可以将 `myTaskTemplate` 用作资源，如以下示例所示：Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#MyTaskTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#mytasktemplate)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据模板化示例简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 指定数据对象的可视化。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果定义了多个模板，并且想要提供逻辑来返回要使用的模板，则使用此属性。If you have more than one template defined and want to supply logic to return a template to use, then you use this property. 请注意，如果设置 ，则忽略此属性。Note that this property is ignored if is set. 为视觉对象自定义提供了极大的灵活性，并提供了许多样式设置和模板化属性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用 属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。Use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件;对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 若要影响项的布局，请使用 属性。To affect the layout of the items, use the property. 如果对控件使用分组，则可以使用 "" 或 "" 属性。If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the or property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 除非样式本身包含对潜在运行时引用（如系统资源或用户首选项）的引用，否则，通常建议对样式 `StaticResource` 引用以提高性能。Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance. *SelectorResourceKey**SelectorResourceKey* `x:Key` 字符串值，该值引用作为资源请求的选择器。`x:Key` string value referring to the selector being requested as a resource. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将 `auctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 资源名称（对应于 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 类）分配给 的 属性。In the following example, the `auctionItemDataTemplateSelector` resource name (corresponding to an `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class) is assigned to the property of the . [!code-xaml[DataTemplateSelector#ItemTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemtemplateselector)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法的重写来实现 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 类：The following example shows the implementation of the `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class with an override of the method: [!code-csharp[DataTemplateSelector#DataTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/CSharp/AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector.cs#datatemplateselector)] [!code-vb[DataTemplateSelector#DataTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplateSelector/visualbasic/auctionitemdatatemplateselector.vb#datatemplateselector)] 在这种情况下，在类的 方法中，有一个逻辑，根据传递的 `item` 对象的 `SpecialFeatures` 属性的值返回相应的模板。In this case, within the method of the class, there is logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `SpecialFeatures` property of the `item` object passed. 在封装 元素的资源中找到要返回的模板。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element. 设置 属性时， 将被定向到为该 绑定到的集合中的每个项自动调用 `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` 的 方法。When you set the property, the is directed to automatically call the method of `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the collection to which the is bound. 调用以对象的形式传递数据项。The call passes the data item as an object. 然后，使用方法返回 显示该数据项。The that is returned by the method is then used to display that data item. 有关其他示例，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For another example, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
